body: pg 30 cracked me the hell up

Wow, this one was surprisingly good. I litterally just read it for the plot and the art.
Impressive how dramatic it was, and how real issues were brought up.
I mean, it's not shakespeare, and it won't spark any debate, but this was one of the only.

Jesus, disgussing hentai with noone in partiqular. Didn't see myself here.

Anyway, stay safe out there, eat your vitamins, stay in school, find ways to be happy, develop a system for not forgetting your clothes in the washing machine, don't project yourself astreally without a dimensional anchor, keep working on your personal projects - even if it is only 20 minutes each week, and so on and so forth.

(┛✧Д✧))┛彡┻━┻
I was waiting for this one since I saw it on pixiv years ago..
